author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;doc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; ANSWER SECTION:
doc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	281	IN	CNAME	hosting.gitbook.io.
hosting.gitbook.io.	300	IN	CAA	0 issue "letsencrypt.org"
hosting.gitbook.io.	300	IN	CAA	0 issue "digicert.com"
